pkg_game

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkg_game.GameEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts the game. It also evaluates and executes the commands that the parser returns.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
